documents.name: Terms Of Use and Pri­va­cy Policy
documents.text:
WEBSITE TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR GUIDING TECH

Last Updated: 5 December 2020
This document is an electronic record in terms of Information Technology Act, 2000 and rules made there under as applicable and the amended provisions pertaining to electronic records in various statutes as amended by the Information Technology Act, 2000. This electronic record is generated by a computer system and does not require any physical or digital signatures.

This document is published in accordance with the provisions of Rule 3 (1) of the Information Technology (Intermediaries Guidelines) Rules, 2011 that require publishing the rules and regulations, privacy policy and Terms of Use for access or usage of www.guidingtech.com.
The domain name ‘www.guidingtech.com’ (hereinafter referred to as “Website”/”Guiding Tech”) is owned and operated by Zeus, LLC, hereinafter also referred to as the “Company”.

The Company offers this Website, including all information, tools and services available from this Website to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.
ACCESSING, BROWSING OR OTHERWISE USING THE WEBSITE INDICATES YOUR AGREEMENT TO ALL THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS UNDER THESE TERMS OF USE, SO PLEASE READ THE TERMS OF USE CAREFULLY BEFORE PROCEEDING. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO OR WISH TO BE BOUND BY THE AGREEMENT, YOU MAY NOT ACCESS TO OR OTHERWISE USE THE WEBSITE.

TERMS OF USE OF THE WEBSITE

Guiding Tech publishes original articles about the latest in technology, science, useful technological tricks, apps and improvements. All article content published on the Website is the original intellectual property of the Company unless otherwise indicated through express declaration by the Company.
Do note that these terms and conditions are subject to review and change at the discretion of the Company and as per applicable law from time to time. You are advised to regularly revisit this page in order to stay up to date on all such changes which shall continue to be binding upon you along with its modifications.

Affiliate links disclosure

Although at Guiding Tech we primarily talk about free apps and tools, we write about useful paid apps too and sometimes the Website uses affiliate links for these products. This does not affect Guiding Tech’s editorial integrity though and we tend to write about only the apps and products that we know will benefit our readers. Our allegiance and loyalty is only to our readers and we only write about stuff that’s of top quality and useful, paid or not.

Guiding Tech provides links on the Website to third party websites which you may employ to access such third-party websites. This being the case, you agree that you may access such third-party websites at your own risk and that Guiding Tech bears no responsibility towards the content, its accuracy, objectionability, timeliness, validity, copyright compliance, legality, decency and or quality at any point in time. THE COMPANY DOES NOT WARRANT/ ENDORSE/ASSUME AND WILL NOT HAVE ANY LIABILITY OR RESPONSIBILITY TO YOU OR ANY OTHER PERSON FOR ANY THIRD-PARTY SERVICES, THIRD PARTY MATERIALS OR WEB SITES, OR FOR ANY OTHER MATERIALS, PRODUCTS, OR SERVICES OF THIRD PARTIES.

You are not permitted to use any computer program tools, including, but not limited to, web spiders, bots, indexers, robots, crawlers, harvesters, or any other automatic device, program or algorithm or any similar equivalent process . to access, acquire, copy or monitor any portion of the Website or content, or in any way reproduce or to deliberately circumvent the navigational structure or alter the presentation of the Website or any content, to obtain or attempt to obtain materials, documents or information through any means not purposely made available through the Website.
You are not allowed to commercially exploit this Website without the Company’s express permission for the same. All rights not expressly granted herein are reserved by the Company.
You are prohibited from using this Website or its content: (a) for unlawful purposes. (b) to solicit others to perform or participate in any unlawful acts. (c) to violate any applicable laws or regulations whether national/state/international. (d) to infringe upon or violate any party’s intellectual property rights. (e) to harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate any person based on gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, race, age, national origin, or disability. (f) to submit false or misleading information. (g) to upload or transmit malicious programs/viruses or any other type of similar code that may be used to affect the functionality or operation of the Website/clandestinely track individual persons or organizations. (h) for any obscene or immoral purpose. or (i) to interfere with or circumvent the security features of any Website or the internet.

The Company reserves the right to report any of the above actions in the event of any user violating conditions on any of the prohibited uses.

Disclaimer of Warranties and Liability

8.1 The Company does not represent that the Website or any feature of the Website will be error-free or uninterrupted, or that any defects will be corrected, or that your use of this Website will provide specific results. This Website and its content are provided on an “as is” basis without representations or warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement or accuracy.

8.2 The Company assumes no responsibility and shall not be liable for any damages caused by viruses or other forms of destructive malware/code that may affect your computer equipment, software, data or other property on account of your access to, use of or browsing the Website or your downloading of any materials, text, images, video or audio from the Website. The Company shall not be responsible if information made available on this Website is not true, accurate, complete or current. The material on this Website is provided for general information only and should not be relied upon or used as the sole basis for making decisions without consulting primary, more accurate, complete or timely sources of information. Nothing herein constitutes or is meant to constitute, advice of any kind and any understanding to the contrary shall be to your own risk.

8.3 You are notified that the contents of this Website may entail historical information of the topics being discussed/published. Such information may not be current is provided for your reference purposes only. The Company reserves the right but not the obligation to modify the contents of this Website at any time. You agree that it is your responsibility to check for such changes to the Website if they may be available.

8.4 In no event shall the Company, its parents, affiliates, subsidiaries ,service providers, licensors, or the officers, directors, employees, shareholders, interns, suppliers or agents of each of them, be liable for any injury, loss, claim, damages of any kind, including without limitation any direct, special, incidental, indirect, exemplary, punitive or consequential damages, including lost profits, lost revenue, savings, loss of data, replacement costs, or any similar damages, whether or not advised of the possibility of such damages and on theory of liability what so ever, arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of, or your browsing this Website or being directed to other websites through third party links on this Website.

Although at Guiding Tech we will do our best to provide constant, uninterrupted access to our material/published content, we do not warrant that the Website shall function at all times due to the possible presence of technical glitches/maintenance issues from time to time.

In the event, you, the user is below the age of majority ie. below eighteen years of age (minors), you are required to gain express permission from your parent/guardian as the case may be before you subscribe to any of the content on the Website and or participate on any discussion forum on the Website. Importantly, do not disclose your/your parent’s/guardian’s personal information/identity/email ID/contact information on the Website under any circumstances

Copyright Policy of Guiding Tech

All copyright and intellectual property rights in all content published on Guiding Tech (including but not limited to text, audio, video or graphical images), belong exclusively to Guiding Tech. You are not permitted to use/modify/copy/reproduce/claim credit over any content published on Guiding Tech except with the express wriiten permission of Company in this regard. We also make it clear that a breach by you of this stipulation of these terms of use of the Website would result in violation of the Company’s copyright and other proprietary rights by you and shall render you liable for civil, criminal or other legal proceedings.

The Company makes no representations or guarantees about the suitability for third-party use of content that appears on the Website, and licenses herewith only the content of which the Company is the copyright holder. The above-mentioned policy applies to Guiding Tech’s RSS Feed too and any other medium through which Guiding Tech publishes content.
Privacy Policy

At Guiding Tech, we recognize that privacy of your personal information is important. By virtue of accepting these Terms of Use, you consent to the use of your personal information, if any provided by you, by Guiding Tech in accordance with the terms of and for the purposes set forth under this Privacy Policy. Here is information on what types of personal information the Company receives and collects when you use and visit Guiding Tech and how we at the Company safeguard your information. We never sell your personal information to third parties.

12.1 Log Files

As with most other websites, we collect and use the data contained in log files. The information in the log files include your IP (internet protocol) address, your ISP (internet service provider, such as AOL or Shaw Cable), the browser you used to visit our site (such as Internet Explorer or Firefox), the time you visited Guiding Tech and which pages you visited throughout the Website.

12.2 Cookies and Web Beacons

Guiding Tech uses cookies to store information, such as your personal preferences when you visit the Website. This could include only showing you a popup once in your visit, or the ability to login to some of our features, such as forums.

12.5 Advertising

This Site is affiliated with CMI Marketing, Inc., d/b/a CafeMedia (“CafeMedia”) for the purposes of placing advertising on the Site, and CafeMedia will collect and use certain data for advertising purposes. To learn more about CafeMedia’s data usage, click here: www.cafemedia.com/publisher-advertising-privacy-policy

12.4 No license to third party intellectual property: There may be a number of proprietary logos, service marks, brand names, trade names and trademarks found on Guiding Tech whether owned/used by third parties or otherwise. By displaying them on this Website, the Company does not grant you any license to utilize those proprietary logos, service marks, or trademarks. Any unauthorized use of such content may violate copyright laws, trademark laws, the laws of privacy and publicity, and civil and criminal statutes.
Except as otherwise indicated on this Website and except for the logos, trademarks, service marks, brand names and trade names of other companies that are displayed on this Website, all trademarks, logos, brand name, copyright, service marks and trade name associated with our Company are the sole and exclusive property of the Company.


Newsletter Subscription: You may choose to subscribe to Guiding Tech’s newsletters and have it delivered to your personal email IDs. In order to subscribe to these newsletters, you may be required to provide Guiding Tech with your personal information such as name, email ID, for instance in order to begin the subscription. However, you may at any point in time choose to withdraw from such subscription by way of clicking on the option so provided in the newsletter delivered to your email ID and no further correspondence would take place on the subject matter between Guiding Tech and you.

Guiding Tech allows its readers/subscribers/visitors to update/modify/delete their personal information and requests for the same shall be responded to by Guiding Tech in a timely manner to the best of Guiding Tech’s ability. Such requests may please be sent to the following email address: . support@guidingtech.com

Possibility of merging or acquisition: The users/visitors of Guiding Tech are informed that Guiding Tech would be required to transfer to an acquiring/resultant entity, as the case may be, any information collected on user behaviour/personal information of users (if provided by users), if Guiding Tech is acquired/merged with another company.

Comment policy

In order to make comments on Guiding Tech useful and interesting, the following guidelines have been established for comment users:

Do not post threatening, harassing, defamatory, or libelous material.

Do not intentionally make false or misleading statements.

Do not offer to sell or buy any product or service.

Do not post material that infringes copyright.

Do not post information that you know to be confidential or sensitive or otherwise in breach of the law.

Keep all comments relevant to the article on the Website where the comment is being posted.
Guiding Tech will not accept responsibility for information posted in the comments. Guiding Tech also reserves the right to delete any comment if it finds it to be inappropriate or if it is not following the comment policy.

Governing Law

These terms in their entirety shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of India including but not limited to the Information Technology Act, 2000 and all its relevant rules, regulations, directions, orders and notifications. The place of jurisdiction for any disputes that may arise under these terms shall be in Puerto Rico.

Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Company and its parent, subsidiaries, affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, contractors, licensors, service providers, artists, . subcontractors, suppliers, interns and employees, harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, made by any third-party due to or arising out of your breach of these Terms of Use or terms they incorporate by reference or your violation of any law or the rights of a third-party while using the Website.

Severability

In the event any provision of these Terms of Use, is determined to be unlawful, void, prohibited or unenforceable in any jurisdiction, such provisions shall be ineffective to the extent of such prohibition or unenforceability without invalidating the remaining provisions of these Terms of Use or affecting the validity or enforceability of such provisions in the same or any other jurisdiction.

Termination

At its sole discretion, the Company may modify or discontinue the Website, or may modify or terminate your account/your access to this Website, for any reason, with or without notice to you and without liability to you or any third party.

Contacting Us

To contact us with any questions or concerns in connection with this Agreement or the Site, please write to us at support@guidingtech.com

Last updated on 1 Dec, 2020
